parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns the render scale of the object relative to the original model.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getObjectScale]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - Object to return scale of. Can also be a [[nearestTerrainObjects|terrain object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Scale relative to the original model

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_scale = [[getObjectScale]] _object;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setObjectScale]]
</value></part></template></root>
